en: Can we talk? Somewhere private? [color=YELLOW]Too many eyes and ears here.[/color]
Meet me by the old storage shed after your shift. I have something you need to see.
Getting cozy with coworkers? Remember, getting friendly can lead to... [color=DARK_ORANGE]compromised judgment[/color].
I've been gathering information about rejected potatoes. [wave amp=20 freq=3][color=CRIMSON]They don't go to deportation centers.[/color][/wave]
[tornado radius=4 freq=2][color=CRIMSON]They go to Root Reserve processing facilities.[/color][/tornado] Every single one.
These documents show potatoes being unloaded at a facility marked with the [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color] logo.
I think I know what's happening. [pulse freq=3][color=CRIMSON]They're becoming Root Reserve.[/color][/pulse]
"That's insane. They're... processing potatoes into food?"
"We need more evidence before making accusations."
[color=CRIMSON]Cannibalism with extra steps.[/color] That's what [wave amp=25 freq=3][color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color][/wave] is. And we've been helping select their ingredients.
I've been collecting evidence for months. Keep your eyes open. You'll see I'm right.
We need to go. They do security sweeps at this hour. Think about what I've shown you.
Sasha stuffs the folder into your hands. "[color=YELLOW]Keep this safe. And trust no one.[/color]"

You hide the folder inside your jacket. [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color]. The rejections. The missing potatoes. It all connects in a [tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=CRIMSON]horrifying way[/color][/tornado].
